attributes.action: ensure that any individual requiring an organ transplant due to their alcoholism should automatically go to the bottom of transplant lists.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair to those suffering from liver disease due to illness beyond their control if organs are given to patients who have destroyed their livers due to excessive drinking. There is no excuse for ignorance when the Government bombards us with health information about the dangers of drinking.
